biotools.summary: Panache (Pangenome analyzer with chromosomal exploration) is a web-based interface designed for the visualization of linearized pangenomes. It can be used to show aresence/absence information of pangenomic blocks of sequence or genes in a browser-like display.

bioschemas.name: Panache
bioschemas.summary: Panache (Pangenome analyzer with chromosomal exploration) is a web-based interface designed for the visualization of linearized pangenomes. It can be used to show aresence/absence information of pangenomic blocks of sequence or genes in a browser-like display.
